text: You are my everything when I need it whether I say it or not.
You let me be me and support/understand all of it without making me feel bad or too much of a bad thing.
When I laugh with you , I know it is a real laugh.
You never let me doubt us, and you reassure me that you us aren‚Äôt going anywhere anytime soon.
You always make me feel like the world most precious and special thing/person in the world when you say I love you baby or say anything at all.
You feel like home ü§çü§ç.
You make me feel secure and confident in who I am when you say stupid things. ü§çü§ç.
You never dim my light or make me feel like I need to adjust myself for you.
I am falling in love so far and feel with my new favorite best friend.

You put the effort into making me comfortable and safe regardless of what we are like. Yesterday you asked if you could touch me even though I moved to be next to you , waiting for you to rub my back the way you do when I want you close and to protect me even though I don‚Äôt need you to.
You don‚Äôt let me feel like I need to protect or save myself because you anticipate it and do it.
You make me wanna rip all my walls up even the ones that protect my heart.
You care about all the little things that I love and make me happy and I just wanna do the same. I wanna notice all the little things and maybe if I need to fix anything or undo things that hurt you.
You keep choosing me every day to love.
You made me believe in relationships and love again for myself.
You take time to make sure that I am ok and know that you love me even when you‚Äôre busy.
You are committed to us and making it work.
You are my annoying little butt.
Your patience to go slow and gentle with me.
You bring out the best in me.
I can see you there right next to me wherever life goes. You made me less scared of falling in love.
You remind me it is us against the multiverse.
You say 'we' for everything- good or bad, we are going to get through it.
Thank you for looking at me like I am this incredibly precious person.
You make me feel less alone.
Because of you , I am less afraid of falling in love.
You make failing/falling seem less overwhelming and terrifying.
You make us a priority.
You love so much where it feels consuming and push yourself to be the best and put everything and more into what you are doing.
No matter what your day is like, you always check in on me to make sure I am good.
You remind me that we are worth fighting for and always will be.
You know me better than I know myself.
Every day, I find a new reason to love you more.
You never fail to make me feel safe.
You remind me that I don‚Äôt always have to be my strong independent self and that I am beyond capable of being loved.
You go out of your way to look things up to comfort and pit me.
You treat me like the best thing ever and I would do everything again to get to you and not just once but a million times.
You remind me that my feelings are valid.
You never let me feel like I can‚Äôt say or bring something up to you.
You listen to the little things that I say and remember them.
You get excited (if not more) when I get excited over the silly things.
You remind me that I am worth so much more than I am.
You never let me sleep without hearing your voice.
You remind that you are here to protect and remind that I treat myself like I am worth protect myself.

You‚Äôre the person who I would run to no matter the weather or situation and I would do it in a heartbeat even when you don‚Äôt ask me to because you would do it for me because you make me feel loved and appreciated and protected.
You became my person, my favorite one ever.
You make me wanna find new ways to annoy you just so I could see your silly 'oh shit I am in love with her and there is nothing she can do to annoy me' grin.
Thank you for being the missing piece that I needed along. ü§çü§ç
Your smile and voice just bring me back down to earth and it always takes me to cloud 9.
Everything you do makes me feel so incredibly loved and seen
The way you ask when you wanna do something new and not assume I would be down for it
Bc you us are worth protecting and fighting for
How we have kissed so much before and it still leaves me with butterflies and breathless
You take time to remind to be careful even though I am all the time.
You validate me and all my feelings
Your smile is one of the most infectious things about you and it drew me towards you so much and your eyes too
You are one of the few people who can get me to talk for hours on end and never feel like I am controlling the conversations or boring you
You let me process before I say something when we have serious conversations
You showed me what love is and what it isn‚Äôt.
My safety blanket, you have become it so much so where I am ok with emotionally vulnerable and raw without feeling the shame
